Uses of Class
games.stendhal.client.entity.Entity

Packages that use Entity
Package
Description
games.stendhal.client
the Stendhal Client.
games.stendhal.client.entity
entities are all the interactive objects of the gaming world (including players, NPCs, creatures, items, signs, chests, portals, ...)
games.stendhal.client.events
events sent from the server to the client
games.stendhal.client.gui
the user interface including all dialogs, the main game window and views for the game entities.
games.stendhal.client.gui.j2d
